Address.label: Address
Address.value: 4042 PARK OAKS BOULEVARD,SUITE 350, TAMPA, Florida, 33610, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Lazydays Holdings Inc operates recreational vehicle dealerships. It provides various products, including RV sales, RV services, financing and insurance products, RV parts and accessories, RV rentals, third-party protection plans, and RV camping for RV owners. The company offers various new and used vehicles; onsite general RV maintenance and repair services; and collision repair services, as well as sells and installs various parts and accessories.
